name: jaw-fossil
effect: Can be revived into a Tyrunt.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Tyrunt.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that once lived on the land. It looks as
if it could be a piece of a large jaw.
